name: Buggy

trigger.text: Rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.

text:
[On Play] If you do not have another "Buggy" character in play, up to one of your leaders gains [Double Attack] until the end of the turn.
[Trigger] Rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: If you do not have another "Buggy" character in play, up to one of your leaders gains [Double Attack] until the end of the turn.
